resources.string:
Manual:

1.click the button "Show Floating Spirit", then got the Spirit.
2.click the "Home" button, return to home.
3.open a Video APP, play the video which you want.
4.long click the Spirit, the Spirit will be red to lock the screen.
5.unlock the screen by clicking "volume+" and "volume-".

Tips:

It is free to let us know if you have any issue about it, mail us by volunteer2003@gmail.com, thanks!!!
